title: Stage Lv9-P5-S25
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: He came, he saw, and then, after long deliberation and much hesitation, he conquered.
We planned, we prepared, and finally, through months of careful execution, we succeeded.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 그는 왔고, 보았고, 그리고서 오랜 심사숙고와 많은 망설임 끝에 정복했습니다.
sentences.en: He came, he saw, and then, after long deliberation and much hesitation, he conquered.

sentences.kr: 우리는 계획하고, 준비하고, 마침내 몇 달간의 세심한 실행을 통해 성공했습니다.
sentences.en: We planned, we prepared, and finally, through months of careful execution, we succeeded.

sentences.kr: 그들은 도착했고, 평가했고, 그 후 놀라운 정밀성으로 실행했습니다.
sentences.en: They arrived, they assessed, and subsequently, with remarkable precision, they executed.

sentences.kr: 시작했고, 진행했고, 마침내 모든 어려움을 극복하고 완성했습니다.
sentences.en: We started, we progressed, and ultimately, overcoming all obstacles, we completed.

sentences.kr: 분석하고, 검토하고, 마침내 충분한 데이터를 바탕으로 결정했습니다.
sentences.en: We analyzed, we reviewed, and finally, based on sufficient data, we decided.

sentences.kr: 도전하고, 실패하고, 그러나 끊임없는 노력으로 마침내 성취했습니다.
sentences.en: We challenged, we failed, but then, through relentless effort, we finally achieved.

sentences.kr: 연구하고, 개발하고, 마침내 혁신적인 기술로 형태를 갖췤습니다.
sentences.en: We researched, we developed, and eventually, it took shape as innovative technology.

sentences.kr: 학습하고, 적용하고, 마침내 전문성과 경험을 통해 마스터했습니다.
sentences.en: We learned, we applied, and finally, through expertise and experience, we mastered.
